Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Sets compensation and maximum compensation for the boards of directors of off-track betting corporations
Summary: Increases compensation and maximum compensation for the boards of directors of off-track betting corporations.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to setting compensation and maximum compensation for the boards of directors of off-track betting corporations
